title: Bitty 2.0
shortDescription: Migrated Bitcoin price notifications from Home Assistant to standalone Python bot on GitHub Actions. Fixed timing issues, duplicate notifications, and baseline logic problems.

title: Synology to TrueNAS Migration
shortDescription: Migrating from underpowered Synology DS124 to custom TrueNAS server with i5-12500, 32GB RAM, and 2x8TB mirrored drives for 4K Plex transcoding and more.
